segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching as far as he can, and the stool is wobbling dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is just waiting with her hand out, like this is totally normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right behind the woman’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool could tip any second, and he’s going to fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl even realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should turn around and see what they’re up to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just making everything more dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get caught before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
